# setScale(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/xScale] and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/yScale] properties of the node.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setScale(_ scale: CGFloat)
```

```swift
func setScale(_ scale: CGFloat)
```

## Parameters

- **scale**: The new value to use for the nodeâ€™s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/xScale] and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/yScale] properties.

## Scaling and Rotating

- **zRotation**: The Euler rotation about the z axis (in radians).
- **xScale**: A scaling factor that multiplies the width of a node and its children.
- **yScale**: A scaling factor that multiplies the height of a node and its children.
